abstracts.cdata!:
The project comprises: (a) the
            construction or reconstruction of 109 miles of trunk roads
            in the Western State; (b) the reconstruction of eight
            damaged bridges on federal roads A121, A122 and A232; (c)
            consultant and technical services for supervising the above
            construction and for feasibility studies, final engineering,
            and improved highway planning and maintenance operations;
            and (d) equipment for highway planning and for control of
            vehicle weights.
